import React from 'react' import { getRecipes } from '../actions/index.js' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {useEffect} from 'react' function Card() { const recipe = useSelector(state => state.recipe)//TRAETE DEL ESTADO EL RECIPE return (

{recipe[0].title}

{recipe[0].diets}

) } export default Card
